backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and storage maps for categories, products, garden centers, orders, and users, plus authorization helpers and search functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files and components for the GreenPlantz app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining OKLCH color tokens, CSS variables, and dark mode theme rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the React app and linking favicon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up global providers and full TanStack Router route tree for all public, admin, and portal pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access-denied message with optional principal ID and a button back to home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalId: Card displaying the user's principal ID with copy-to-clipboard support and feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper enforcing platform-admin access using caller role lookup with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Displays a login prompt when the user is not authenticated; otherwise renders its children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireCust: Checks caller role and authentication, showing loading or access denied screens, and only allows customers to proceed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireGard: Grants access only to authenticated users who are garden center members or platform admins, with loading and denial states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequirePlat: Restricts access to authenticated platform admins and shows loading or denial states with principal ID when unauthorized.
Provides the main page layout with header, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/FooterSoc: Renders a set of social media links with icons for WhatsApp, Instagram, and email.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer with brand info, quick links, social/contact links, and service area details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders the site header with navigation, account‑aware portal links, admin links, and mobile menu.
Shows a small badge with the cart item count, hidden when the cart is empty.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product card with image, details, price, stock status, and link to the product page.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminProduct: Provides mutations for adding products, initializing seed data, and a placeholder for toggling product active state.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useGardenCenter: Fetches products for a garden center by filtering active products when backend support is missing.
Provides React Query hooks for listing garden centers and mutating team membership, with several methods stubbed until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/usePlatformAdmi: Defines mutations to grant or revoke platform admin access using the actor and invalidates caller role queries.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role from the backend and provides a helper to check if the caller is a platform admin.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Retrieves the authenticated user's profile from the backend with loading state tied to actor resolution.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserRol: Queries whether the current caller is an admin by calling isCallerAdmin on the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Provides a mutation to save the caller's user profile and refresh related profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useCreateGard: Creates a new garden center via the actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useGardenCent: Fetches and manages products for a garden center, with fallbacks where backend methods are missing.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useMyGardenCe: Fetches the caller’s primary garden center using role data and returns placeholder data until backend support exists.
frontend/src/hooks/nursery/useUpdateGard: Updates a garden center’s basic info and invalidates relevant queries after mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useOrders.ts: Retrieves orders for the user but currently returns an empty list due to missing backend support.
Attempts to place an order by mapping cart items but throws because backend functionality is not implemented.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useCategor: Loads all categories from the backend using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useFullCat: Fetches full category taxonomy including subcategories from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/storefront/useProduct: Retrieves a single product by ID using the actor.
Provides hooks for active products, category-filtered products, and client-side search fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines custom CSS variables for themes, colors, and layout. Includes global styles and a reusable container class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNurseriesP: Admin page for managing garden centers, including expanding details, managing members, and removing or disabling entries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPlatformAd: Allows platform admins to add or remove admin users by validating and submitting Principal IDs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin interface for adding new products, toggling product active status, viewing categories, and initializing seed data.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and checkout navigation. Displays an empty state or a detailed cart summary.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays a searchable and filterable product catalog using category taxonomy and search hooks. Manages category filters, search input, and dynamic product listing.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows order summary and handles order placement, requiring user authentication via Internet Identity. Redirects if the cart is empty and clears the cart on successful order.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Provides the homepage with a hero section, features, and top-level category listings. Fetches category taxonomy and displays marketing content with navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/MyOrdersPage.tsx: Displays the logged‑in user's order history with loading skeletons, empty state, and order details including products and totals.
frontend/src/pages/nursery/NurseryDashbo: Dashboard page for nursery members to manage garden center info and products, including editing details and adding new products with categories and images.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows an order confirmation message and optionally displays the order ID with links to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/portals/CustomerPorta: Redirects authenticated customers to the catalog and shows loading or access‑denied states based on role.
frontend/src/pages/portals/NurseryPortal: Handles nursery member or admin access, redirecting existing members to the dashboard or allowing new nursery registration.
frontend/src/pages/portals/TeamPortalPag: Checks for platform admin access and redirects to admin pages or shows access‑denied with principal info.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and displays detailed product info with image gallery, quantity selector, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/store/cart/CartProvider.tsx: Provides cart context with persistence, item management, totals, and quantity updates.
frontend/src/store/cart/cartStorage.ts: Implements localStorage persistence for cart items with versioning and BigInt handling.
frontend/src/store/cart/types.ts: Defines types for cart items, state, actions, and context.
frontend/src/store/cart/useCart.ts: Hook to access the cart context with an enforced provider requirement.
frontend/src/utils/categoryTaxonomy.ts: Utility functions to flatten category taxonomies, find nodes, check leaf status, and gather descendants.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed UI with container settings and extended design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines the project's state, including high-level goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature metadata for the GreenPlantz platform.
